column1: This Thanksgiving I am especially thankful for the doctors nurses & essential workers who have carried us through this pandemic. As always I am so grateful you have given me the honor of representing you in Congress. Happy Thanksgiving & please be safe! https://t.co/etp7nvtVnP

It’s official - President-Elect Biden! How good does that sound?! I am confident he will be a President who will bring us all together and I can’t wait to work with him and @KamalaHarris to do so! https://t.co/FdBHulcZru
Congratulations President-Elect @JoeBiden and Vice President-Elect @KamalaHarris! I am looking forward to working with you to heal our country.

Following this election we have to start to fix the lack of equality opportunity and unity in this country. With @JoeBiden as our President I believe we can and I am looking forward to working with him and @KamalaHarris to bring about change. https://t.co/RQdODmfBq6
The process is working. All the votes are being counted. @JoeBiden is on the path to victory. https://t.co/dBRK01XB4f
I am so grateful to Contra Costa County for re-electing me and sending a resounding message about the kind of community and country we want to live in. Thank you! https://t.co/ioF2OueoVq
Once every vote is counted I believe we will have a #BidenHarris victory. Tune in for my thoughts on this post Election Day. https://t.co/B4im4XF1g6
Thank you #CA11 for re-electing me to represent you in Congress! Serving the people of Contra Costa has been my honor and I look forward to continuing our work together. https://t.co/DUonbyXNZg
Reminder: The election is over when all the votes are counted regardless of what @realdonaldtrump says. Make your voice heard. #EveryVoteCounts
We have the power to choose the future we want we just have to #vote! I hope I can count on your supoort and let's elect #BidenHarris2020. Polls close at 8:00 p.m. https://t.co/Mw8GWPG82i
Our nation’s values are on the ballot. #Vote https://t.co/m9FNrDWQR3
#BidenHarris2020 https://t.co/xSWORrDq7w

TOMORROW is your last chance to make your voice heard. It has been an honor to represent you in Congress and I humbly ask for your vote again. I hope you will also cast your ballot for @JoeBiden and @KamalaHarris so we can begin to heal this nation. #Vote #BidenHarris2020 https://t.co/b919ST56fU

It has been an honor to represent you and I promise that I will continue to fight for you and your family everyday in Washington. But first I need you to send me back to Congress by voting on November 3rd. I hope I can count on your #vote. https://t.co/jo88Z90KmB
My work on these committees led to Congressional Quarterly saying “a day with DeSaulnier illustrates the breakneck schedule of the House’s busiest members.”
I represent the interests of Contra Costa on House committees including: Education & Labor Transportation & Infrastructure & Oversight & Government Reform.

Mitigating the effects of climate change has been one of my top priorities. I worked to address congestion and road safety in areas like the East Bay as part of an effort to invest in mass transit and put our country on a path to zero pollution.

I’ve been a strong supporter of racial justice sponsoring legislation to dismantle the systems that were built to disadvantage people of color hold problematic police officers accountable and ban the use of deadly chokeholds.
During this pandemic I fought for coronavirus relief that directly benefits the people and businesses of Contra Costa protects frontline workers and expands unemployment insurance.
I have been a fierce advocate for women’s rights including fair pay and reproductive freedom. https://t.co/r49n21Fiw4

Amidst the Trump Administration’s attacks on the Affordable Care Act I have worked to safeguard the health care of our families and millions of Americans by fighting to strengthen and expand the ACA. https://t.co/SVC6oASWeg
In a highly partisan environment I was able to get things done passing 28 initiatives into law and 26 measures in the House by reaching across the aisle and finding commonsense solutions.

Unity. Respect. Equality. Four days before the most important election of our lifetime this is what is at stake. If we vote for @JoeBiden and @KamalaHarris we can restore our democracy and change this country for the better. https://t.co/GLCY8CX7kc

For these efforts our office was recognized by the non-partisan Congressional Management Foundation as a model in Congress for excellence in constituent service transparency and accountability. https://t.co/DSH629zF6q

In just 5 years as your Congressman I have held 117 town halls to connect directly with you responded to over 563000 of your letters and helped over 5300 people navigate government problems. https://t.co/mCvs0sKArs

I am so proud to represent you in Congress where I have fought everyday on behalf of Contra Costa families. As we approach Election Day here’s a look back on some of our key accomplishments. It would be my honor to continue to serve you and I ask for your #VOTE. https://t.co/WXEFP09HI2
#OnlyTheYoung https://t.co/u9CMhPsxFA
If you want to see the U.S. take on climate change and save our planet @JoeBiden is your only choice on November 3rd. #Vote #BidenHarris2020 https://t.co/MzpsOQjiRd

ONE WEEK out from the most important election of our lifetimes it is so important that you make a plan to vote. Let's make @JoeBiden our next President take back the Senate and ensure our government starts working for the American people! #VoteThemOut https://t.co/vH1u0oMoEG
#OurVoteIsEssential #Congress4Caregivers

Caregivers are essential & we need an Administration that recognizes their contributions & invests in #LongTermCare! That’s why I’m supporting the #BidenHarris campaign. Support the Biden Care Plan by standing with @SEIU2015 & signing their pledge today: https://t.co/adSYTfgpPy
Last night @JoeBiden laid out his plans for a more just prosperous and equal America. He has my vote and I hope he can count on yours! #Vote #BidenHarris2020 https://t.co/xYk2AL4xhb
Thank you to @Indivisibleeb CA-11 for inviting me to speak at your town hall and thanks for all you are doing to elect progressives to Congress across the country! #vote https://t.co/ofCYIhlZmX

Tonight I’ll be watching @JoeBiden talk about his plans to beat this pandemic & restore our economy tackle climate change and work toward racial justice at the #Debate2020. Tune in and then make a plan to #vote at https://t.co/BlRqxb8oxV!

In just 2 weeks we can wake up to a President who understands true leadership and will work with House Democrats to get our economy back on track. But first we have to vote. Vote by mail or in person on November 3rd. https://t.co/l6FFDK8Rqi https://t.co/RQcznhwmlu
We can’t take another four years of President Trump’s lies and lawlessness. So vote for @JoeBiden and @KamalaHarris on or before November 3rd! #BidenHarris2020 https://t.co/BR9qmf95sw
If you have not yet registered to vote make sure to do so by TODAY'S deadline at https://t.co/eJxqPGwq9N so that you can help elect @JoeBiden and @KamalaHarris! #BidenHarris2020
REMINDER: TOMORROW is the last day to register to vote. Do so at https://t.co/OqCLZkuYh1 and help us elect @JoeBiden and @KamalaHarris in the most important election of our lifetime. #BidenHarris2020
We need all the help we can get to grow our Democratic majority and beat Donald Trump.

But I know that in order to work towards solutions for this pandemic we have to keep power out of the hands of the Republican Party in the House of Representatives. I would be so grateful if you would consider contributing $5 $10 or $25 to my campaign. https://t.co/EfLXfHKcjE
I’m so glad I had the opportunity to tell my health story with @sfchronicle. After a life-threatening fall I could not be happier to be back to work for our district. https://t.co/ges1zyVJX2

Remember to vote for @JoeBiden and @KamalaHarris by November 3rd. If you’re voting by mail here are some important tips on filling out your ballot. Happy voting! #BidenHarris2020 https://t.co/xUoETIAG2q

The Supreme Court granted Trump's request to end the Census early allowing him to once again exert unprecedented political power that will advantage Republicans in redistricting & future elections. Fill out the#2020Census before TOMORROW's deadline at https://t.co/5QMYL2d7s2 https://t.co/f61u2PMz53

We are just 3 weeks from the most important Election Day of our lifetimes but you don’t need to wait until November 3rd to vote. All registered CA voters will automatically receive a mail-in ballot. More info on filling it out at https://t.co/LimTbd5yxd.
You still have time to register to vote. Don’t wait! Visit https://t.co/l6FFDK8Rqi to get registered. The deadline to register is October 19th @JoeBiden & @KamalaHarris need your support.

From the economy to climate action there is too much at stake to sit this election out. Check your voter registration status or register at https://t.co/OqCLZkuYh1 to vote for @JoeBiden & @KamalaHarris. We can’t take another 4 years of Donald Trump.

I am doing all I can to help @JoeBiden & @KamalaHarris take back the White House but we need your help. Check your voter status register & get more info on filling out your mail-in ballot at https://t.co/OqCLZkuYh1.
Looking forward to watching @KamalaHarris make the case for #BidenHarris2020 in the debate tonight! #VPDebate https://t.co/eHgwsb9YMN
Listen to @MichelleObama talk about what is at stake in this election. #VoteBidenHarris2020 https://t.co/Dtbt70sxzm

Early voting in California has begun! Contact your county election office to see what hours they offer early voting and don’t wait to cast your vote for @JoeBiden & @KamalaHarris. https://t.co/PKSEDfxvKN

ICYMI: I hope you will take a few moments to read @CaptSully's eloquent post. I am proud that he will be joining us on Saturday September 26th for a special event. https://t.co/ejsJwcakkk https://t.co/FwdxWLm86g

I am delighted that Vice President Biden has chosen Senator Kamala Harris as nominee for Vice President. Senator Harris has been a relentless champion for the people of California and I know she will bring that same dedication to the vice presidency. https://t.co/EAMEgkFjGy

Please consider supporting our campaign by putting up a Mark DeSaulnier lawn sign. To register for a sign email us at teammarkdesaulnier@gmail.com with your name and address and we will drop it off at your home. Thanks for your support!

I'm so grateful for the support of the people of Contra Costa when I was in the hospital with non-COVID pneumonia and now as I continue working hard on my recovery. It is my full intention to seek reelection & I need your help. https://t.co/tBJ3y94sm4 https://t.co/P2KQos1TDc

Thank you Contra Costa for your support tonight! It is an honor and a privilege to represent our community in Congress. Together we will keep the House take back the Senate and defeat Donald Trump. #BlueWave
Reminder that polls stay open in California until 8:00 p.m. Every vote counts! #SuperTuesday

As your Rep. in Congress I have held over 100 town halls helped more than 4600 constituents navigate gvt. problems & passed 28 initiatives into law. I ask for your support today so that I can continue serving California's 11th district which I am honored to do every day.
Today is the #CAprimary! Make sure to cast your ballot in this historic election. Together we can take back our democracy. #VoteBlue #SuperTuesday

The #CAprimary is tomorrow! Polls open at 7:00 a.m. and stay open till 8:00 p.m. Make sure to get out and cast your ballot! For information on where to vote visit: https://t.co/3KRAHsCxH2 #SuperTuesday
The California Primary is Tuesday March 3rd. The right to vote is important & sacred. Be sure to vote in this most important election. https://t.co/TrPzyhZuPK

2020 is the most important election of our lifetimes. We must stay focused on what is most important: keeping the House winning the Senate & taking back the White House. Whoever the Democratic nominee is we must unite behind & support to accomplish this.  #Bluewave2020 https://t.co/pS75O8ntGW
@CAPublicHealth is working to prepare for and prevent the spread of Coronavirus. For more information visit:  https://t.co/0PfsJXgie4.
The President's unwillingness to put medical facts before his desire to be right is dangerous and threatens our nation's credibility. #VoteBlue https://t.co/aQXqXz8KLm
It is one week until the California primary. To find your polling place visit:  https://t.co/jtuix7ZldH Together we can keep the #majority! #Vote

The President's purging of federal employees to surround himself with people loyal only to him undermines the legitimacy of our government. This is how despots not democratic leaders behave. It is more important than ever to #VoteBlue in 2020  https://t.co/tmwXHbVzOE
A number of people have asked if I am endorsing in the SD 7 race.  As of right now I have not endorsed.
Lt. Col. #Vindman is an American patriot who put his career on the line to speak truth to power. He honored his Constitutional oath. He is a hero. The President is a coward.   https://t.co/fX5o581WWK
Today's disgraceful vote by GOP Senators is a rallying cry and it falls upon us to hold them to account.  Remember in November and get out the vote!  #electionsmatter

Colorado Arizona Maine Alaska North Carolina Iowa and yes even Kentucky.  We may not live there but we can still make the difference. Phone bank donate challenge your friends that live in the states that will determine the balance of power in the Senate.
Watch as Governor Gretchen Whitmer delivers the Democratic response to tonight's speech. Let's make this Trump's #lastSOTU  https://t.co/zQEDTZK0zv
1) the electoral college; 2) impeachment; and 3) presidential elections every four years. The first two failed us. Vote.  https://t.co/N0DWWMmTUI
Senate Republicans voted 51-49 to block witnesses from testifying in the President's impeachment trial. Our Constitution provides 3 safeguards to protect against an unlawful president:
Caption contest: Submit your ideas! https://t.co/sjoFxQIlay

The Office of the President under Trump is an ethical bottomless pit. The question that will be answered this week is whether Senate Republicans have abandoned our Constitution the law facts and morality. https://t.co/eAgi6ePVe3

@RepAdamSchiff today "President Trump abused his authority as commander-in-chief and chief diplomat to benefit himself and he betrayed the interests of the American people when he did so."   https://t.co/13Ya16Ck4D
As @RepAdamSchiff said today "If impeachment and removal cannot hold him accountable...then he truly is above the law."   https://t.co/QEEDvP4YMi
Their lack of impartiality and willingness to be open to the truth is an insult to the American public and a violation of their duty.

House managers presented a compelling case at today's impeachment trial. However despite hours of evidence being laid in front of them Republicans Senators continue to claim that they are hearing nothing new.

So far in today's impeachment trial every single Republican Senator has voted against the production of documents and witnesses. The American people deserve better. #DefendourDemocracy https://t.co/YdN4aFt4se

As we remember and celebrate Dr. King’s life and fight for freedom let it be a reminder that his dream of a truly equal society is not complete. We must strive everyday to build a fairer more equitable country. #MLKday
Congrats to the @49ers on winning the NFC Championship. On to the Super Bowl!!
